text: BIG HIT : Rita Ora and Liam Payne's duet For You is on course to become the biggest new entry Rita ’ s sexy Fifty Shades Freed duet with the 1D star, For You, is on course to become the biggest new entry on the official charts this week. But producers of the upcoming movie sequel had different plans for the first single and wanted Justin Bieber to be the man to get listeners hot under the collar. A source told me : “ Originally Universal Pictures wanted Justin Bieber to sing a song on the soundtrack, either with or without Rita. “ He ’ s the biggest male pop star in the world and so that ’ s what they aimed for.
